p: COVID-19, like the Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) and Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS), belongs to the group of ribonucleic acid (RNA) viruses that circulate among animals with some of them also known to infects humans [ 4]. These viruses are very common in the world and are so called because of the crown-shaped tips that are present on their surface [ 5].
